==Tutorial==

Since *SPADE* is under active development, below we will explain how you can download, compile, and run the latest version of the code.

*SPADE*'s is written in Java, allowing it to be used on a wide range of platforms. The steps described assume a Linux or Mac OS X command line environment. (Analogous steps can be taken on Windows.)

===Downloading *SPADE*===

  * Download the external libraries that *SPADE* uses:

  `svn checkout http://data-provenance.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/lib/`

  * Create the *SPADE* source directories:

  `svn checkout --depth empty http://data-provenance.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/`

  `svn update --set-depth immediates src/spade`

  * Download the *SPADE* kernel:

  `svn update --set-depth infinity src/spade/core/`

  `svn update --set-depth infinity src/spade/opm/`
